target_markets.market_description: Residential waste collection customers - scatter customers (individual homes) and HOA communities
demographics: HOA communities tend to be higher income
mix of income levels for scatter customers
pain_points: need for reliable trash, recycling, and yard waste collection
target_markets.market_size_indicators: 70% of service area consists of HOA communities, 30% scatter customers, currently serving 2500 customers with goal of 3000 for profitability

problems_validated.problem: Waste collection business struggling with profitability despite revenue growth
problems_validated.severity: Critical - losing $151,000 annually with growing family to support
problems_validated.current_solutions: One major competitor causing price pressure in scatter market
problems_validated.market_gap: Inefficient route utilization and asset management in capital-intensive business

products_tools.name: Garvey Disposal Services
products_tools.use_case: residential trash, recycling, and yard waste collection
products_tools.pricing: $29.67/month for scatter customers ($89 quarterly), variable pricing for HOAs
products_tools.metrics: $642,000 revenue, -$151,000 net profit, -23% net margins, 2500 customers, under 2 years in business

business_strategies.strategy: Door-to-door sales with high conversion rates
business_strategies.implementation: 300 doors knocked per week, 26% close rate, 30% door open rate
business_strategies.case_study: Owner doing 300 doors/week, hired contractor doing 5 sales/day with $50 commission

business_strategies.strategy: Dual customer acquisition model - scatter customers and HOA contracts
business_strategies.implementation: Different service levels: scatter gets weekly service, HOAs get 1-2x weekly (80% choose twice weekly)
business_strategies.expected_results: 3000 customers identified as critical mass for profitability
business_strategies.case_study: Currently at 2500 customers, need 500 more to reach break-even

problems_solutions.problem: Negative 23% profit margins in capital-intensive waste collection business
problems_solutions.solution: Multiple optimization areas identified: asset utilization, route efficiency, lead generation, HOA conversions
problems_solutions.time_estimate: urgent - 6 weeks until new baby arrives

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Leaving high-paying tech job without proper business model validation
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Working 16 hours/day, 7 days/week for 2 years with negative returns, family financial stress
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Validate profitability model before making career transition
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Philip left Amazon software engineering job, now losing $151K annually

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Under-utilizing expensive capital assets in capital-intensive business
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: One truck at only 50% utilization contributing to negative margins
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Focus on asset utilization optimization before scaling
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Waste collection trucks sitting idle while business loses money

growth_tactics.tactic: High-frequency door knocking with proven conversion rates
growth_tactics.results_expected: 1 sale per 12 doors knocked, contractor achieving 5-7 sales per day

metrics_kpis.optimization_tip: 1 sale per 12 doors knocked is achievable
Improve route efficiency and asset utilization

trends_signals.trend: HOA market dominance in residential areas
trends_signals.opportunity: 70% of service area is HOA-controlled, requiring contract-based sales approach

actionable_quotes.quote: I'm definitely in the thick of my rocky cut scene right now where I left my high-paying job at Amazon as a software engineer to start this
actionable_quotes.context: Entrepreneur describing the struggle of transitioning from stable employment to risky startup
actionable_quotes.actionability: Validates the emotional and financial challenges of career transitions

actionable_quotes.quote: By my estimations, 3,000 customers is going to be that critical mass point where we're going to start to make some money
actionable_quotes.context: Identifying specific milestone for business profitability
actionable_quotes.actionability: Set clear customer acquisition targets for break-even

key_statistics.statistic: 26% close rate on door-to-door sales with 30% door open rate
key_statistics.context: Waste collection service door-to-door sales performance

key_statistics.statistic: 70% of service area consists of HOA communities
key_statistics.context: Market composition for residential waste collection
